name: Falling In Love With Oranges
description:
This is my submission for TriJam #13

Find the brightest orange color in the grid. You got 3 lives. The game gets harder as you get further along.

The theme was falling in ... but as I was already looking for ideas on what to do with the theme orange I came up with this game and changing the title would still fit the theme :).

the orange icon is part of the fruits icon pack made by Robert Brooks - Fruits icon pack
